front.title: •Oola
front.gametext: During your control phase, may cause opponent to reveal entire hand by using X Force, where X = number of cards in opponent's hand. All unique (•) male Imperials or unique (•) male aliens there are placed in opponent's Used Pile.
front.lore: Female Twi'lek musician. Became a dancer to live a life of luxury. Has worked for Jabba for only two days. Desperate to escape.
